    About

    OSPedia is an open-source website that aims to educate people about the history of various influential operating systems of the present, including Windows and macOS. It also aims to make people appreciate today's software.

    You can view the source code for this website on GitHub.

    Credits:

    • 512 Pixels for the screenshots and wallpapers on MacPedia
    • Netlify for hosting this website
    • Eleventy for being a simple and useful static site generator preventing me from having to update recurring elements individually across 40+ pages

    If you have any suggestions, contact me at keyboard1000n17@gmail.com.
